TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintDialog extends System.Object

summary.span: 叫用根據使用者輸入設定 和 的標準 Microsoft Windows 列印對話方塊，然後列印文件。

span.span: Invokes a standard Microsoft Windows print dialog box that configures a and according to user input and then prints a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以使用**列印**對話方塊來選取印表機、 加以設定，以及執行列印工作。A user can use the **Print** dialog box to select a printer, configure it, and perform a print job. 嚴格來說，您可以使用方法，而不需要不斷開啟對話方塊。Strictly speaking, you can use the method without ever opening the dialog. 這點而言，此控制項可用來當做看不見的列印元件。In that sense, the control can be used as an unseen printing component. 但基於效能考量，它會使用其中一個方法，或任何一種並方法。But for performance reasons, it would be better to use either the method or one of the many and methods of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 以程式設計方式列印 XPS 檔](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-programmatically-print-xps-files.md)。For more about this, see [How to: Programmatically Print XPS Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-programmatically-print-xps-files.md). 請勿混淆這個類別中， ，使用。Do not confuse this class, , with . 後者可搭配 Windows Forms 應用程式。The latter is used with Windows Forms applications. 搭配 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式。 is used with Windows Presentation Foundation applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立的執行個體，並顯示簡單使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]標記和程式碼。The following example shows how to create an instance of and display a simple by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup and code. [!code-xaml[PrintDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] ...... [!code-csharp[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者只要按一下 [**列印**當**列印**] 對話方塊中設定列印頁面所設定的範圍之外和值將會收到錯誤訊息建議他們的最大和最小頁碼。Users who click **Print** when the **Print** dialog box is set to print pages outside the range that is set by the and values will get an error message advising them of the maximum and minimum page numbers. 不會列印。Nothing will be printed.
